interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Review Date: 2021/01/12 Store: Anzuo Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'} Review Text: I grew tired of paying to have my gel done at a salon, so I decided that I would do it myself now. After looking for a while, I decided to get the "ANZUO Shimmer Gel Nail Polish Set Christmas Party 6 Colors UV LED Soak Off Gold Silver Nail Polish Kit for Women" with hopes that it would work well.
I'm glad that I did, because this polish is great. Aside from the fact that the glitter is very messy, this polish is very nice. It is very smooth and hardens quickly, as well. Whenever I went to remove the polish, I could glitter everywhere. I kinda saw it coming, but it was still a little bit annoying. This polish does last quite a long time, though.
Overall, this polish gets a 4 out of 5. If the glitter wasn't so messy, my rating would be higher. Review Title: Great polish, messy to apply and/or remove Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
CIMIY Gel Nail Polish Set 8 bottles - Manicure Colors Infinity with Top Base Coat for Forest Nail Art Natural Daily All Seasons for Nail Profession Salon and Starter at Home Soak Off UV LED 0.32oz CIMIY {'Brand': 'CIMIY', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Liquid Volume': '0.3 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '11.54 x 3.58 x 1.22 inches; 11.64 Ounces'} My daughter was sick of paying more money at the salon for them to paint her acrylics, so I got her the "CIMIY Gel Nail Polish Set 8 bottles - Manicure Colors Infinity with Top Base Coat for Forest Nail Art Natural Daily All Seasons for Nail Profession Salon and Starter at Home Soak Off UV LED 0.32oz" to paint her nails with.
This polish requires an LED/UV lamp, so I also had to buy that for her. Other than that, this polish is great. It came with a base coat and a top coat, as well as 6 fall-inspired shades. The polish is very beautiful and doesn't make a huge mess. I had her put them under the lamp for 3 minutes after each coat and wound up using 2 coats of the colored polish on her nails. This gel polish hardens very nicely an doesn't get any dents or fingerprints.
Overall, I recommend this polish to people who are tired of overpaying at the salon. After looking for a while, I decided to get the "ANZUO Shimmer Gel Nail Polish Set Christmas Party 6 Colors UV LED Soak Off Gold Silver Nail Polish Kit for Women" with hopes that it would work well.
I'm glad that I did, because this polish is great. Aside from the fact that the glitter is very messy, this polish is very nice. It is very smooth and hardens quickly, as well. Whenever I went to remove the polish, I could glitter everywhere. I kinda saw it coming, but it was still a little bit annoying. This polish does last quite a long time, though.
Overall, this polish gets a 4 out of 5. If the glitter wasn't so messy, my rating would be higher. Great polish, messy to apply and/or remove
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interest:** At-home nail care and manicure.
- **Product Preference:** Favors gel polish for its durability, professional finish, and non-toxic, cruelty-free attributes; appreciates products that allow for vibrant, glittery designs.
- **Usage Context:** Engages in DIY nail art as a cost-effective alternative to salon services, particularly for creating intricate designs. Recent experiences highlight challenges with glitter products, particularly regarding messiness during application and removal.
- **Behavior Patterns:** Focused on quality and ease of use, balancing aesthetics with functionality. Values reliable products that harden quickly and deliver long-lasting results. Shows a keen interest in comprehensive sets that include essentials like base and top coats.
- **Target Audience:** Interested in products suitable for both personal use and family, reflecting a practical and budget-conscious approach to nail care.
- **Seasonal Considerations:** Prefers colors that align with seasonal themes, showing a trend towards versatile and aesthetically pleasing options for different occasions.
- **User Experience:** Values products that minimize mess, though experiences with glitter indicate some frustration in this area. Overall, seeks high-performing items that enhance the home manicure experience.

This summary reflects the user's commitment to at-home manicures, a blend of quality, practicality, and seasonal aesthetics, while also acknowledging potential challenges with certain product types.
